hero.title: Let’s talk about your next step.
hero.subtitle: Reach out for course questions, project mentoring, or career planning. Pick the channel that works best for you.

contactMethods.label: Email
contactMethods.hint: Best for sharing resumes, project details, or course partnerships

contactMethods.label: WeChat
contactMethods.hint: Project assistant account — add a note like “Course inquiry” or “Project chat.”

contactMethods.label: Discord
contactMethods.hint: Quick calls to plan learning paths or discuss career moves

tips: When you reach out, include a short intro and your goal so we can help faster.
If you need a WeChat QR, drop the image into /public and render it here with <Image>.
For 1:1 coaching or mock interviews, feel free to propose a time in your message.
